manipulations.insert_object: Add a large, photorealistic parrot perched on the microphone stand in front of the singer.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the glasses from the singer's face, ensuring the skin tone blends seamlessly.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the dark background with a vibrant sunset scene, matching the lighting on the singer.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain to the scene, creating realistic reflections on the stage and blurring the background.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the singer's white shirt to be made of a shimmering, reflective metallic fabric.
